arrive1.description: The house has its own boat dock, with two great big boats. Unfortunately they belong to a neighbor.
arrive1.title: Arrive 1

arrive2.description: Lucie and the kids in the air conditioned porch (it's 90 degrees and crazy high humidity). The boats are reflected in the windows.
arrive2.title: Arrive 2

arrive3.description: We've only been here eight hours. Milo's favorite thing so far is the DVD player in the rented minivan.
arrive3.title: Arrive 3

chairs1.description: Nothing says "summer on the east coast" like adirondack chairs overlooking a dock.
chairs1.title: Chairs 1

chairs2.description: Mmmmmm, "adirondack chairs". Say it out loud. You know you want to.
chairs2.title: Chairs 2

eat.description: Milo chows down on the porch.
eat.title: Eat

hammock.description: Felix's first encounter with a hammock. The hammock won.
hammock.title: Hammock

pool1.description: We have a pool. Felix showed off his new swim skills -- he passed his swim course this week with flying colors, and is moving to the next level when we get back.
pool1.title: Pool 1

pool2.description: Milo is happy and fearless in the water.
pool2.title: Pool 2

pool3.description: Nothing says "hugely funny" like a submerged mommy shark monster tickler.
pool3.title: Pool 3

pool5.description:
Wheee!

The not-so-good part is that he'll do this whether or not he has a float on, and whether or not an adult is around.
pool5.title: Pool 5

zunset.description: Sunset over the mighty Miles river. Actually, to be precise, this is Long Haul Creek. It feeds into the Miles maybe 10 houses down.
zunset.title: Zunset

description:
We're on a vacation again. You know the secret to vacationing with small children?

Double Grandma Action

We have not one but TWO grandmas representin': Nana and Babushka. To make this work we flew east from San Francisco and Babushka flew west from France. We met approximately in the middle: Washington DC, where Nana lives.

We rented a house in St. Michael's, Maryland. It's on the Miles River, which gives into the Chesapeake Bay.
title: July 30
